entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Sudbury (Greater)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:23 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Sudbury Airport 3:00 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 86 %
Dewpoint: -0.3°C
Wind: SSE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers or drizzle. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers or drizzle early this evening. Snow beginning this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
